title: Three ways studying organic chemistry changes the brain

title_detail.value: Three ways studying organic chemistry changes the brain

summary: A new study using multiple imaging modalities shows that learning scientific information results in changes in the actual structure of memory-related areas of the brain, changes due to the encoding of the new information in these memory-related brain areas, and changes in the coordination among the network nodes that jointly contain the new information.
